content: @binilacrochet f r e e f r e e p a t t e r n p a t t e r n @binilacrochet @binilacrochet materials - 4-ply cotton blend yarn in orange green yellow and white i used alize cotton gold - 2 00mm crochet hook - stitch marker - fiberfill - yarn needle - scissors - glue gun - keychain ring abbreviations mc magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tc triple treble crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch increase increase decrease decrease blo back loop only @binilacrochet @binilacrochet notes - this pattern is written using us terms and is worked in rounds do not join at the end of the round unless stated otherwise - using a similar yarn and hook size as mine the mandarin will be approx 4 cm - if you have any questions contact me binilacrochet@gmail com or send me a dm on instagram @binilacrochet - if you make a mandarin don t forget to tag me so i can see happy crocheting~ @binilacrochet @binilacrochet mandarin with orange r1 7sc in mc 7 r2 7inc 14 r3 1sc 1inc 21 r4 2sc 1inc 28 r5 single_crochet all around 28 r6 3sc 1inc 35 r7-r10 single_crochet all around 35 -4 row- r11 3sc 1dec 28 r12 2sc 1dec 21 stuff with fiberfill r13 1sc 1dec 14 r14 7dec 7 fasten_off using a yarn needle sew the hole close and weave in end @binilacrochet @binilacrochet leaf and stem with green leave tail at beginning to sew on the mandarin later ch7 single_crochet on 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 4ch in last chain 1sc 1slst do not fasten_off proceed to crochet the leaf ch8 slip_stitch on 2nd chain from hook in the next chains 1sc 1hdc 1dc 1dc 1tc 2dc in last chain on the other side of the foundation chain 2dc in one chain 1tc 1dc 1dc 1hdc 1sc 1slst fasten_off and weave in end using the beginning tail sew the leaf and stem on top of the mandarin @binilacrochet @binilacrochet flower with yellow r1 5sc in mc 5 change to white r2 ch6 slip_stitch on 2nd chain from hook in next chains 1sc 1dc 1dc 1hdc slip_stitch in blo of the next yellow single_crochet repeat 5 times to get 5 petals fasten_off and weave in ends with a glue gun glue the flower on the stem part of the leaf attach a keychain to the top and voilà your mandarin keychain is done d @binilacrochet
